title: Clarity.AI
author: Yuzhe Wang
excerpt: Clarity.AI streamlines your day by turning schedule chat screenshots into calendar events and to-do lists. Using AI, it extracts key details like time, location, and participants, helping you stay organized effortlessly and focus on what matters most.

Clarity.AI streamlines your day by turning schedule chat screenshots into calendar events and to-do lists. Using AI, it extracts key details like time, location, and participants, helping you stay organized effortlessly and focus on what matters most.
